sentences.en: Although geographically linked, the two provinces have long fought for political ascendancy.
sentences.cn: 尽管在地理上彼此依存，两省却长期为获取政治支配权你争我夺。
亚里斯多德的科学早已盛行一时.

sentences.en: At present the wet methods seem to be in the ascendancy.
sentences.cn: 目前看来湿法似占上风.

sentences.en: Germany only awaits trade revival to gain an immense mercantile ascendancy ( Winston S. Churchill )
sentences.cn: 德国只等着贸易复苏以获取巨大的贸易优势 ( 温斯顿S. 丘吉尔 )

sentences.en: He gained the ascendancy over me in the last election.
sentences.cn: 他在上次竞选中胜过我.

sentences.en: He has the ascendancy over all his main rivals.
sentences.cn: 他有压倒一切主要对手的优势.

sentences.en: He is completely under his wife's ascendancy.
He slowly gained ascendancy in the group.
sentences.cn: 他渐渐控制了这个群体。

sentences.en: Markets are in the ascendancy , as oil analyst Daniel Yergin has argued.
sentences.cn: 正如石油分析员丹尼尔叶尔津所说:市场支配一切.

sentences.en: Still, Apple ascendancy in mobile phones has been tough to stomach.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 苹果在手机领域取得的优势还是让微软难以接受.

sentences.en: The " bulls ", those who make money on a rising market, are in the ascendancy.
sentences.cn: 趁市场行情上涨而赚钱的 “ 多头 ” 占了上风.
极端分子正逐渐占据上风。
他们确立了他们的支配地位.

sentences.en: They were chiefly " balance - of - power'and ascendancy wars.
sentences.cn: 它们主要是 “ 力量对比 ” 、争夺优势的战争.

sentences.en: Throughout a stormy autumn the U - boats struggled vainly to regain the ascendancy in the North Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 在整个多风暴的秋季中,德国潜艇极力想在北大西洋重新取得优势,但是并未成功.

sentences.en: We have had ascendancy over the enemy in the battle.
sentences.cn: 在战斗中我们已占有优势.

words.tran_cn: 优势；权势；支配地位（等于ascendence或者ascendancy）

trans.tran_cn: 优势，支配地位，支配倾向
trans.tran_en: a position of power, influence, or control
